languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} бросается на противника, перемещаясь сквозь его позицию на клетку с противоположной стороны, и совершает атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, уменьшенный на 50%.
-<indent=5%>К одной цели можно применить не более одного раза за раунд.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Fighter dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced damage.
-<indent=5%>can be applied only once for one target per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}</indent>

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}穿过敌人，抵达敌人对面的格子，进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，但造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。
- <indent=5%>每轮只能对同一个目标使用一次。</indent>
- <indent=5%>不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
战士穿过敌人，抵达敌人对面的格子，进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，但造成的伤害降低50%。
- <indent=5%>每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}只能对同一个目标使用一次。</indent>
- <indent=5%>不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}穿过敌人，抵达敌人对面的格子，进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，但造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。
- <indent=5%>每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能对同一个目标使用一次。</indent>
- <indent=5%>不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} atraviesa a un enemigo y llega hasta la casilla del lado opuesto, efectuando un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con un −50 % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Solo puede aplicarse una vez a cada objetivo en cada asalto</indent>
-<indent=5%>No suscita un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El guerrero atraviesa a un enemigo y llega hasta la casilla del lado opuesto, efectuando un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con un −50 % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Solo puede aplicarse una vez a cada objetivo en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>No suscita un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}は敵の反対側のセルまでダッシュし、通常の−50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行う。
-<indent=5%>1ラウンドにつき、1体のターゲットにのみ使用可能。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}につき、1体のターゲットにのみ使用可能。</indent>

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Боец бросается на противника, перемещаясь сквозь его позицию на клетку с противоположной стороны, и совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%.
-<indent=5%>к одной цели можно применить не более 1 раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g}</indent>

Боец бросается на противника, перемещаясь сквозь его позицию на клетку с противоположной стороны, и совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%.
-<indent=5%>к одной цели можно применить не более 1 раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} sprintet durch einen Feind zu dem Feld auf der entgegengesetzten Seite des Feindes, und führt dort einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} mit um 50 % reduzierten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus.
-<indent=5%>Kann pro Ziel nur einmal pro Runde eingesetzt werden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Provoziert keinen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Der Krieger sprintet durch einen Feind zu dem Feld auf der entgegengesetzten Seite des Feindes, und führt dort einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} mit um 50 % reduzierten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus.
-<indent=5%>Kann pro Ziel nur einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eingesetzt werden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Provoziert keinen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} s'élance vers un ennemi pour rejoindre la case située de l'autre côté de celui-ci et lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} avec des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} réduits de −50 %.
-<indent=5%>Applicable une fois par cible et par round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Le Combattant s'élance au travers d'un ennemi pour rejoindre la case située de l'autre côté de celui-ci et lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} avec des dégâts réduits de -50 %.
- <indent=5%>Applicable une fois par cible et par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>Ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, bir düşmanı yarıp geçerek düşmanın karşı tarafındaki hücreye doğru atılır ve bu esnada da %50 azaltılmış {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir.
-<indent=5%>Her rauntta bir hedef için yalnızca bir kez kullanılabilir.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısını{/g} tetiklemez.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Can be applied only once for one target per round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.</indent>
